overview:
Pokercheck is a popular german poker community where poker players can chat and learn all about poker, e.g. poker rules, poker news or poker strategies for beginners or advanced players.

There are many good poker sites on the internet but not all of them are really good so it is necessary to pick the ones where playing is a lot of fun. PokerCheck.org tests these poker rooms and reviews them by telling for example which of them has the best software, graphics and other important criteria.
